content: /Tmahonnathante maravilirikkunnavanaaya kartthaave! Ninte anugrahatthinte chirakukallude nizhalin keezhil nyangalle marachu nyangalludemel anugraham cheyyaname.
/tsakalavum kellkkunnavane! Ninte anugrahatthaal ninte adiyaarude apeksha kellkkaname.
/tmahatthvamulllla raajaavum nyangallude rakshakanumaaya mashihaa! Nirappu niranyirikkunna sandhyayum punyamulllla raavum nyangallkku tharaname.
/tnyangallude kannukall ningkalekku nokkikkondirikkunnu. Nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum pariharichu ihaparamaaya randu lokangallilum nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
/tkartthaave! Ninte anugrahangall nyangalle marachu ninte krpa nyangallude mukhangallil nilkkaname; ninte sleebaa dushdanil ninnum avante sainyangallil ninnum nyangalle kaatthukollllaname.

/tnyangall jeevanodirikkunna naallukall okkeyum ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aavasippikkaname. Ninte nirappu nyangallude idayil vaazhumaaraakaname. Ninnodapekshikkunna aathmaakkallkku sharanavum rakshayum undaakkaname.
/tninne prasavicha mariyaaminteyum, ninte sakala parishuddhanmaarudeyum praarththhanayaal, daivame! Nyangallude kadangallkku parihaaramundaakki, nyangallude mel anugraham cheyyaname.
